TopicTitle: Does anyone know how long it takes for contracts to spawn, its been 3 days and still no contracts.

Articles.Content:
The title says it all.

I have completed all the available missions, even the one to do a flyby of the moon, and no more are respawning. It might be a buy, but I could only see contracts from the Kerbal Space Program agent. if it is a bug, what can I do to fix it?

Thanks,

Jongy

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-10T13:19:10Z" title="05/10/2015 01:19  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 10, 2015</time> by Jongy**

Depends on how many contracts you already have (active+available). It is capped, so say there are already 14 contracts in total then probably you need to reject some available or finish some active in order to show the new ones. Otherwise new contracts won't be computed.

If you don't have any - then that's probably a bug.
I guess you're at the beginning of a career and haven't finished the "reach space" contract (climb to 70km)? After completing that one, contracts will start showing up.
This sounds like a bug.... unelss you've just used up all your available contracts and haven't completed them...

> 
> I guess you're at the beginning of a career and haven't finished the "reach space" contract (climb to 70km)? After completing that one, contracts will start showing up.

Right. Some contracts (or actually most?) have prerequisites, e.g. reach somewhere, or unlocking certain parts (e.g. satellite contracts require probes, solar panels, etc.)

I have complete all the contracts from the Kerbal Space Program agency, even the ones to fly by the moon, do i need to delete the old ones from the completed section? I have no active ones because I have no available ones

try deleting some of your completed contacts see what happens. I never look at the completed contacts tab personally but I do click the trash can on the contacts summery in the top right of the screen
I tried that, but they still appeared in my completed section in mission control.
How's your reputation? Contracts eventually stop appearing if your reputation is very low (at least, that's how it worked in 0.90).

> 
> How's your reputation? Contracts eventually stop appearing if your reputation is very low (at least, that's how it worked in 0.90).

My reputation is 22%, im not sure if thats bad or if thats good. If it is bad, how can i improve it?
You can only improve your reputation by doing contracts or using strategies. I don't think that's the issue though.

I would say its a bug, try reloading, 22% is a positive rep, normally you start ad 0%. check for the last time if the are any contracts under active.

22 procent should give you ad least 4 1 star contracts probably 2 2 star. 

after reload wait for 5 day's. 

I that doesn't work try to see if you can upped the game by going next level. (like going 1st time to the moon)
